tree.name: Cam Whitmore
tree.tradeDescription: 3-team trade: HOU sends Whitmore to WAS; WAS sends Poole, Bey, #40 pick to NOP; NOP sends McCollum, Olynyk, 2027 2nd to WAS; WAS sends two 2nd-round picks to HOU
